name: JUMP BRO (Charles)
description:
Background

Walking is lame! It's all about jumping! Jump Bro desires absurd wealth so he decided to climb a tower, looting all the gold found within it!

Description

Jump Bro is a simple platformer made in 1 week in Godot. The game is made in the style of old simple gameboy games.

If you play the game normally you will experience a short and sweet platformer. If you do some digging and exploring, you might stumble across something unsettling.

Controls

  • Hold -> Space - Charge
  • Release -> Space - Jump
  • Hold before jump -> Arrow Keys - Jump Direction
  • Hold while in air -> Arrow Keys - Control Direction
  • Esc -> Pause

Tips

  • Holding the up arrow key will make your vertical jump stronger.
  • Hold arrow keys while in air to control your movement slightly.
  • Tap space while holding direction keys to make micro-adjustments to your position.
  • If you explore you might find something.

Details

  • 16 Short Levels
  • Bonus coins in each level
  • Many secrets you might find if you look hard enough

Future of the game

If there is an interest in the game, I will release more levels and more secrets. I will read every comment.
